alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 9:16PM MST until March 03 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the lower valleys and 5 to 9 inches in Pierce, Elk River and Lolo Pass. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 7 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
